parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the firewall welds can cause the clutch pedal assembly to shift, leading to a loss of clutch function, making it difficult or impossible to shift gears, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Loud creaking or clicking noise when depressing the clutch pedal
brake pedal movement when depressing the clutch pedal
clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Clutch and Brake Pedal Mounting Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch and brake pedal mounting to the firewall can cause the pedals to flex or break away, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The clutch pedal or brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the pedals flex or move when pressed
the pedals stick to the floor
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear or brake properly.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Secondary Air Injection Pump Relay Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the secondary air injection pump relay can cause the pump to overheat, leading to a faulty engine operation, decreased fuel efficiency, and potentially causing the check engine light to illuminate. In extreme cases, it can lead to engine damage or failure.
symptoms: The check engine light is illuminated
the secondary air injection pump is malfunctioning
the pump is overheating
the engine is running rough or misfiring
decreased fuel efficiency.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The inadequate repair of the secondary air injection pump relay recall can lead to additional costs for the vehicle owner, as they may be required to pay for further repairs or replacements of the pump, even if it is related to the original recall issue.
symptoms: The vehicle owner is being charged for additional repairs or replacements of the secondary air injection pump
despite the recall notice indicating that pump replacement may be necessary
the dealer is not covering the cost of the repair
the vehicle owner is experiencing financial burden due to the inadequate repair.
